metadata.title: CVE-2024-46865 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fou: fix initialization of grcThe grc must be initialize first. There can be a condition where iffou is NULL, goto out will be executed and grc would be useduninitialized.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
